body_html: just make a model with a 3d input with 1billion entries on each side, and a single conv, and it will probably happen. Anything several orders of magnitude beyond the actual memory in the GPU. Oh, also might need to be using nvcc.

body: just make a model with a 3d input with 1billion entries on each side, and a single conv, and it will probably happen. Anything several orders of magnitude beyond the actual memory in the GPU. Oh, also might need to be using nvcc.
